project.description: Chart NextGeneration (NG) is a JavaFX chart component based on the 2017er custom zoomable stacked chart implementation. The chart was initial inspired by JFree chart for Swing. But mean while it is much more powerful especially with it's concept of stacking chart with different y-axis scale. In contrast to previous versions the commons Chart NG isn't (pseudo) fully generic anymore. Instead a long (timestamp) on x-axis and double (value) is fixed part of the component to clarify it's focus on time series.
